document.full_text: luggage maker samsonite, backed by private equity firm cvc capital partners , moved closer to a $1.5 billion hong kong initial public offering, setting an indicative range for the deal on monday as it bet on booming asian demand for global consumer brands.
document.title: samsonite sets price range for $1.5 billion hk ipo: sources
lines_and_colors: luggage maker samsonite, backed by private equity firm cvc capital partners , moved closer to a $1.5 billion hong kong initial public offering, setting an indicative range for the deal on monday as it bet on booming asian demand for global consumer brands.
